import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; function App() { let newDate = new Date(); let current = newDate.toLocaleDateString() let [headers, setHeaders] = useState({ header:"", headertwo:"" }) let [patientInputs, setPatientInputs] = useState({ PatientName:"", address:"", age:"", date: current }) let [doctorsInputs, setDoctorsInputs] = useState({ DoctorsName:"", PRC:"", PTR:"" }) function changeHandler(e){ let value = e.target.value; setPatientInputs({ ...patientInputs, [e.target.name]: value }) } console.log(patientInputs.date) return (
